OOC: If you say my ideas suck fine, but don't complain
unless you TOTALLY understand what I'm saying.  Oh and
actually rAuq said he's considering modifying my idea
to better suit the rpg (although I didn't totally
understand how).

--- Stone Cold Mike Coburn <1641coburn@...>
wrote:
> OOC:  Dewboy, if I can quote the awesome Chris
> Jericho who is only cool as a
> heel:  WOULD YOU PLEASE, SHUT, THE HELL,
> UP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  You're ideas
> could be worth considering, but the considering
> would be pointless because
> you're ideas suck.  You think you're ideas are great
> and that you're
> awesome, well guess what?  You act like an immature
> 13-year old or
> something, because all you do is rant and rave and
> say stuff and continue to
> get on my nerves!  Man, if there wasn't any of those
> weird "nice-guys" such
> as rauq on the council, but instead me, you would
> soooooo have your ass
> kicked!  And now, the council is either going to act
> like the Corporate
> idiots called the McMahons and start lecturing me on
> how I shouldn't swear
> and crap and say the truth by saying your ideas
> suck, and/or you're going to
> reply to this with your monotonous whining...

> (I
> > noted making a char successfully act messed up in
